sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState } from "react" import jsPDF from "jspdf" import autoTable from "jspdf-autotable" const generateInvoice = ({ formData, data, paymentMethod, paymentId }) => { try { const doc = new jsPDF("p", "mm", "a4") // Set units to millimeters and A4 size doc.setFontSize(10) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Thulasi Readymix", 10, 30) doc.setFontSize(8) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("3/124, Elaiyagoundanpalayam", 10, 34) doc.text("Kathirampatty (Po)", 10, 37) doc.text("Erode (Dt) 638 107.", 10, 40) doc.text("Ph: 99655 35741", 10, 43) doc.text("GSTIN/UIN: 33AAXFT1459P1Z9", 10, 46) doc.text("State Name: Tamil Nadu, Code: 33", 10, 49) doc.text("E-Mail: thulasireadymixerode@gmail.com", 10, 52) // Invoice Title doc.setFontSize(12) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Tax Invoice", 100, 20, { align: "center" }) doc.setFontSize(8) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("(ORIGINAL FOR RECIPIENT)", 185, 20, { align: "right" }) // Consignee (Ship to) doc.setFontSize(9) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Consignee (Ship to)", 10, 62) doc.setFontSize(8) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("Asian Designer Tiles", 10, 66) doc.text("Erode Western Bypass", 10, 69) doc.text("Chithode", 10, 72) doc.text("Erode (Dt) 638 102.", 10, 75) doc.text("Ph: 98403 10364.", 10, 78) doc.text("GSTIN/UIN : 33AGHPR6595E1Z2", 10, 81) doc.text("State Name : Tamil Nadu, Code: 33", 10, 84) // Buyer (Bill to) doc.setFontSize(9) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Buyer (Bill to)", 100, 62) doc.setFontSize(8) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("Asian Designer Tiles", 100, 66) doc.text("94/2, Sathy Main Road", 100, 69) doc.text("Viswasapuram", 100, 72) doc.text("Saravanampatti (Po)", 100, 75) doc.text("Coimbatore (Dt)641 035.", 100, 78) doc.text("Ph: 98403 10364.", 100, 81) // doc.text("GSTIN/UIN : 33AGHPR6595E1Z2", 100, 84) // doc.text("State Name : Tamil Nadu, Code: 33", 100, 84) // Invoice Details Tables const invoiceDetails = [ [ { content: "Invoice No.", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "TRE/425/25-26", { content: "Dated", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "21-Jun-25", ], // [ { content: "Delivery Note", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "517", { content: "Mode/Terms of Payment", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "Cheque", ], // [ { content: "Reference No. & Date.", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "", { content: "Other References", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "", ], // [ { content: "Buyer's Order No.", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "", { content: "Dated", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "", ], // [ { content: "Dispatch Doc No.", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "517", { content: "Delivery Note Date", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "", ], // [ { content: "Dispatched through", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "A.Manokaran", { content: "Destination", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "Chittode", ], // [ { content: "Bill of Lading/LR-RR No.", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "", { content: "Motor Vehicle No.", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "TN56T9172", ], // [{ content: "Terms of Delivery", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, "", "", ""], // ] autoTable(doc, { startY: 90, body: invoiceDetails, theme: "grid", tableWidth: 190, margin: { left: 10, right: 10 }, styles: { fontSize: 8, cellPadding: 1, lineWidth: 0.2, lineColor: 0, }, columnStyles: { 0: { cellWidth: 40 }, 1: { cellWidth: 45 }, 2: { cellWidth: 45 }, 3: { cellWidth: 50 }, }, didParseCell: (data) => { if ((data.cell.raw && data.cell.raw.styles && data.column.index === 0) || data.column.index === 2) { Object.assign(data.cell.styles, data.cell.raw.styles) } }, }) let currentY = doc.lastAutoTable.finalY // Product Table const productTableColumn = [ { content: "SI\nNo..", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "Description of Goods", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "HSN/SAC", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "Quantity", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "Rate\n(Incl. of Tax)", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "Rate", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "per", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "Amount", styles: { halign: "center" } }, ] const productTableRows = [ [ "1", "Ready Mix Concrete M20 Grade\n Without Pump\n Output - CGST @ 9%", "38245010", "4.500 Cum", "5,900.00", "5,000.00", "Cum", "22,500.00\n2,025.00", ], // ["", "Output - SGST @ 9%", "", "", "", "", "9%", "2,025.00"], // [ "", { content: "Total", styles: { fontStyle: "bold", halign: "right" } }, "", "4.500 Cum", "", "", "", { content: "26,550.00", styles: { fontStyle: "bold" } }, ], // ] autoTable(doc, { startY: currentY + 4, head: [productTableColumn], body: productTableRows, theme: "grid", tableWidth: 190, margin: { left: 10, right: 10 }, styles: { fontSize: 8, cellPadding: 1, lineWidth: 0.2, lineColor: 0, valign: "middle", }, headStyles: { fillColor: [255, 255, 255], textColor: [0, 0, 0], fontStyle: "bold", lineWidth: 0.2, lineColor: 0, halign: "center", }, columnStyles: { 0: { cellWidth: 8 }, 1: { cellWidth: 50, halign: "left" }, 2: { cellWidth: 18 }, 3: { cellWidth: 20 }, 4: { cellWidth: 22 }, 5: { cellWidth: 18 }, 6: { cellWidth: 12 }, 7: { cellWidth: 32, halign: "right" }, }, didParseCell: (data) => { if (data.cell.raw && data.cell.raw.styles) { Object.assign(data.cell.styles, data.cell.raw.styles) } }, }) currentY = doc.lastAutoTable.finalY // Amount Chargeable (in words) doc.setFontSize(8) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Amount Chargeable (in words)", 10, currentY + 5) // doc.text("E. & O.E", 185, currentY + 4, { align: "right" }) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("INR Twenty Six Thousand Five Hundred Fifty Only", 10, currentY + 9) // doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") // HSN/SAC Summary Table const hsnSacTableColumn = [ { content: "HSN/SAC", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "Taxable\nValue", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "Rate", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "CGST\nAmount", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "Rate", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "SGST/UTGST\nAmount", styles: { halign: "center" } }, { content: "Total\nTax Amount", styles: { halign: "center" } }, ] const hsnSacTableRows = [ ["38245010", "22,500.00", "9%", "2,025.00", "9%", "2,025.00", "4,050.00"], // [ { content: "Total", colSpan: 2, styles: { fontStyle: "bold", halign: "right" } }, "22,500.00", "", "2,025.00", "", "2,025.00", "4,050.00", ], // ] autoTable(doc, { startY: currentY + 15, head: [hsnSacTableColumn], body: hsnSacTableRows, theme: "grid", tableWidth: 190, margin: { left: 10, right: 10 }, styles: { fontSize: 8, cellPadding: 1, lineWidth: 0.2, lineColor: 0, valign: "middle", }, headStyles: { fillColor: [255, 255, 255], textColor: [0, 0, 0], fontStyle: "bold", lineWidth: 0.2, lineColor: 0, halign: "center", }, columnStyles: { 0: { cellWidth: 25 }, 1: { cellWidth: 25, halign: "right" }, 2: { cellWidth: 25 }, 3: { cellWidth: 25, halign: "right" }, 4: { cellWidth: 25 }, 5: { cellWidth: 25, halign: "right" }, 6: { cellWidth: 30, halign: "right" }, }, didParseCell: (data) => { if (data.cell.raw && data.cell.raw.styles) { Object.assign(data.cell.styles, data.cell.raw.styles) } }, }) currentY = doc.lastAutoTable.finalY // Tax Amount (in words) doc.setFontSize(8) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Tax Amount (in words):", 10, currentY + 5) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("INR Four Thousand Fifty Only", 50, currentY + 5) // Remarks doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Remarks:", 10, currentY + 12) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("Being M20 Grade Concrete 004.500 Cum Sales As Per E.", 10, currentY + 16) doc.text("Invoice No : TRE/425/25-26 Date: 21.06.25", 10, currentY + 19) // Company's PAN doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Company's PAN", 10, currentY + 28) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text(": AAXFT1459P", 40, currentY + 28) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Company's Bank Details", 100, currentY + 12) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("Bank Name : Karur Vysya Bank", 100, currentY + 16) doc.text("A/c No. : 1217011000000020", 100, currentY + 19) doc.text("Branch & IFS Code: Mettukadai & KVBL0001217", 100, currentY + 22) // Declaration and Bank Details doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("Declaration", 10, currentY + 38) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text( "We declare that this invoice shows the actual price of the goods described and that all particulars are true and correct.", 10, currentY + 42, ) // doc.text("goods described and that all particulars are true and correct.", 10, currentY + 40) // // For Thulasi Readymix and Authorised Signatory doc.text("Authorised Signatory", 160, currentY + 62, { align: "center" }) // Footer doc.setFontSize(8) doc.setFont("helvetica", "bold") doc.text("SUBJECT TO ERODE JURISDICTION", 100, 280, { align: "center" }) doc.setFont("helvetica", "normal") doc.text("This is a Computer Generated Invoice", 100, 283, { align: "center" }) return doc } catch (error) { console.error("Error generating invoice:", error) alert("Failed to generate invoice. Please try again.") return null } } const Invoices = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState("") // Mock invoice data - single entry const [invoices] = useState([ { id: 1, invoiceNo: "TRE/425/25-26", date: "2024-06-21", supplier: "Asian Designer Tiles", item: "Ready Mix Concrete M20 Grade", qty: "4.500 Cum", rate: "5,900.00", amount: "26,550.00", }, ]) const formData = { name: "Asian Designer Tiles", email: "asiandesigner@example.com", phone: "98403 10364", shippingaddress: "94/2, Sathy Main Road, Viswasapuram, Saravanampatti, Coimbatore - 641035", pincode: "641035", } const data = { Product_Name: "Ready Mix Concrete M20 Grade (Without Pump)", Product_Category: "Concrete Mix", } const paymentMethod = "PAY_NOW" const paymentId = "pay_MATHAV00425" const handlePreviewInvoice = (invoice) => { try { const doc = generateInvoice({ formData, data, paymentMethod, paymentId }) if (doc) { const pdfBlob = doc.output("blob") const pdfUrl = URL.createObjectURL(pdfBlob) window.open(pdfUrl, "_blank") } } catch (err) { console.error("Error previewing invoice:", err) alert("Failed to preview invoice.") } } const handleDownloadInvoice = (invoice) => { try { const doc = generateInvoice({ formData, data, paymentMethod, paymentId }) if (doc) { const safeId = paymentId ? paymentId.replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/g, "") : "invoice" doc.save(`Invoice-${safeId.slice(-6)}.pdf`) } } catch (err) { console.error("Error downloading invoice:", err) alert("Failed to download invoice.") } } const handleCloseInvoice = (invoice) => { alert(`Closing invoice ${invoice.invoiceNo}`) } // Filter invoices based on search const filteredInvoices = invoices.filter((invoice) => { const matchesSearch = invoice.invoiceNo.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || invoice.supplier.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || invoice.item.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) return matchesSearch }) return (

Invoices

setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{filteredInvoices.length > 0 ? ( filteredInvoices.map((invoice) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Invoice No. Date Supplier Item Qty Rate Amount Actions
{invoice.invoiceNo} {new Date(invoice.date).toLocaleDateString()} {invoice.supplier} {invoice.item} {invoice.qty} ₹{invoice.rate} ₹{invoice.amount}

No invoices found matching your criteria.
) } export default Invoices
